title: English-Speaking Workers Could Boost Québec Economy by $1.5 Billion
description: A new report shows that closing the income and unemployment gap between Québec’s English and French communities would add over $1 billion to Québec’s economy. Montréal, Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Persistent employment and income gaps between English-spe…
content:
A new report shows that closing the income and unemployment gap between Québecs English and French communities would add over $1 billion to Québecs economy.
